description:
Words don`t always convey the truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aller de l`avant n`est pas progresser. La compréhension est primordiale.
Looking Forward Doesn`t Equal Progress on Its Own. Understanding One`s Situation Is Also an Important Step.
Maemuki na dake ga Zenshin to wa Ienai. Joukyou o Shiru Koto mo Taisetsu na Ippo Da.
前向きなだけが前進とは言えない. 状況を知ることも大切な一歩だ.
